jx.jx_cn_mean: 振作起来（以便应付或做成某事）

jx.jx_en_mean: in trouble; in a difficult situation

phrase.cizu_name: be up shit creek (亦作 be up shit creek without a pa

jx.jx_en_mean: To treat with malice or extreme disrespect.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 恶劣地对待：带有恶意地或极其不敬地对待

jx.jx_en_mean: To get organized; put one's affairs or possessions in order.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 使井然有序：使安排有序；把某人的事或东西安排得井然有序

jx.jx_en_mean: Used to express scornful acknowledgment of the obvious.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 用来表示对很明显的事情的带有嘲讽的确认

jx.jx_en_mean: In dire circumstances with no hope of help.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 情况危急而且没有得到帮助的希望

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English scitte 'diarrhoea', of Germanic origin; related to Dutch schijten, German scheissen (verb). The term was originally neutral and used without vulgar connotation

encyclopedia.content: 在英汉词典中的解释基本意思 “shit”在英汉词典中的解释锛埨丛矗喊俣却实滹級： shit KK: [] DJ: [] vt.【粗话】 1、拉锛埵猴級 2、对……胡扯；取笑；企图欺骗 n.【粗】 1、屎，粪便[U] 2、屁话[U] 3、拉屎[S] 4、蹩脚货，一钱不值的东西[S] 5、可鄙的人；愚蠢的家伙[C] 6、胡说八道；谎言；愚蠢[U] 7、大麻；毒品[C]也作pot[s] 8、腹泻[the P] 9.该死 int. 1、【俚】锛埍硎狙岫瘛⒛张蕊級呸！放屁！ shit的其他用法 1、一般

entry.def: Some people use shit to refer to solid waste matter from the body of a human being or animal.
To shit means to get rid of solid waste matter from the body.
To have a shit means to get rid of solid waste matter from the body.

entry.tran: (生病或害怕时的)腹泻,拉肚子
entry.def: If someone has the shits, liquid waste matter keeps coming out of their body because they are ill or afraid.
People sometimes refer to things that they do not like as shit .

example.ex: This is a load of shit.

entry.def: People sometimes insult someone they do not like by referring to them as a shit .

entry.tran: （表示愤怒、不耐烦或厌恶)该死,妈的
entry.def: Shit is used to express anger, impatience, or disgust.
If someone says they are shitting themselves, they mean that they are very frightened.

entry.tran: 狠揍;痛扁;把…打得屁滚尿流
entry.def: To beat or kick the shit out of someone means to beat or kick them so violently that they are badly injured.

entry.tran: 灾难临头;惹麻烦;走霉运
entry.def: If someone says that the shit hit the fan, they mean that there was suddenly a lot of trouble or angry arguments.

entry.tran: 一点不在乎;毫不关心;根本不放在心上
entry.def: If someone says that they do not give a shit about something, they mean that they do not care about it at all.

entry.tran: 遇到大麻烦;陷入困境;倒大霉
entry.def: If someone is in the shit or in deep shit, they are in a lot of trouble.

entry.tran: (虽然不喜欢却不得不接受)糟透了，倒霉
entry.def: Tough shit can be used as a way of telling someone that they will have to accept a situation they do not like because they have no choice.

sentences.sentence: "I put up with a lot of bullshit from that jerk"

example.en: Michael was shitting in his pants.
example.zh: 迈克尔当时吓得屁滚尿流。

example.en: I'm shit-faced, and I know it.

list.explanation: 不中用的人，无足轻重的人，窝囊废

example.en: Who is that crock of shit who brought in the dead eat?
example.zh: 是哪个窝囊废把这中看不中用的东西弄进来的？

list.explanation: 一派胡言，屁话，虚伪的言论，拆烂污的事

example.en: You went on vacation and left this office with a real crock of shit.
example.zh: 你去度假了，把一大堆拆烂污的事留在了办公室。

list.explanation: (表示惊讶或疑问等感叹语) 是真的!不是开玩笑的!

example.zh: 戈尔德大吃一惊地说:"是真的吗？"

example.en: I told him I quite liked his pants, no shit.
example.zh: 我告诉他我很喜欢他的裤子，不是开玩笑。

list.explanation: 不值一文的事物或人，破烂货，拙劣的农演、表现，次品

example.en: The whole project's a pile of shil.
example.zh: 整个计划一无可取之处。

list.explanation: 准备就绪，妥善安排自己的事和生活

example.en: You have five years to get your shit together.
example.zh: 你有五年时间可以料理好一切。
